title: Patrik Gregora
text:
Patrik Gregora (born 6 March 1993) is a <a href="Slovakia">Slovak</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> defender who plays for <a href="%C5%A0K%20Slovan%20Bratislava">Slovan Bratislava juniori</a> .
Slovan Bratislava.
He made his debut for <a href="%C5%A0K%20Slovan%20Bratislava">ŠK Slovan Bratislava</a> against <a href="FK%20Senica">FK Senica</a> on 19 August 2012.
